title: Fried prawns in soy sauce
ingredients: ['100ml oil, divided', '750g raw prawns, deveined, with shell left on and patted dry', '25g spring onions, finely chopped', '25g fresh ginger, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon rice wine', '2 tablespoons chicken stock', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons sugar', 'chicken granules to taste', '2 teaspoons soy sauce']
